channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 10 Years Since Obergefell Have Proven Its Critics Right
item.description: Opposing same-sex marriage is essential to defending the truth about human nature and about how we flourish and are fulfilled.

item.title: Does Jaws Still Matter?
item.description: A fresh look at the blockbuster’s semicentennial.

item.title: Donald Trump Is a Republican Moderate
item.description: The president is smack in the ideological center of a GOP that he has remade in his image.

item.title: The Senate’s ‘Big Beautiful Bill’ Is an Improvement
item.description: But it still continues the irresponsible deficit spending that has characterized the federal government for years.

item.title: How Clarkson’s Farm Debunks Globalist Lies About England And Mass Migration
item.description: Jeremy Clarkson has become an icon of the farming world, a living rebuke to the artificial, technocratic, globalist, and humorless world order that pr...

item.title: Hypocritical Democrats ‘Released The Whirlwind’ Of Political Violence
item.description: Hate-filled Democrats have shown us time and time again that their compassion is privileged and division is their politics.

item.title: The Week: Israel Wages War Against Iran
item.description: Plus: The Supreme Court strikes a blow for basic reality.

item.title: The Abrahamic Covenant Is A Bad Argument For The U.S. Going To War With Iran
item.description: We shouldn't treat the Abrahamic covenant lightly, but neither should we cherry-pick it to haphazardly apply to a modern geopolitical map.

item.title: Indiana Sheriff Argues He Can’t Be Prosecuted For Failing To Cooperate With ICE
item.description: The Democrat-run police department 'has repeatedly released criminal aliens into the community' for at least a year, says the AG's office.

item.title: Appeals court rules Trump can keep control National Guard troops deployed to Los Angeles
item.description: An appeals court on Thursday allowed President Donald Trump to keep control of National Guard troops he deployed to Los Angeles following protests ove...

item.title: What Sports Can Teach America About Swift Justice
item.description: Athletes have a code, one that’s missing on social media and in politics.

item.title: Trump gives Iran two weeks to accept nuclear deal or face U.S. military strikes
item.description: President Trump announced Thursday he'll give Iran two more weeks to negotiate an end to its nuclear program before deciding whether America's militar...

item.title: Trump is silent about Juneteenth on a day he previously honored as president
item.description: President Donald Trump honored Juneteenth in each of his first four years as president, even before it became a federal holiday. He even claimed once ...
